quest.Name: Fetch Cythilde an Artifact
quest.Accomplishment: You found an artifact for a rude tinkerer.
quest.Hagiograph: In a temporary rhombus of hide and hair, =name= showed mercy on an ungrateful inventor.

step.Name: Return to Cythilde
step.text: Return to Cythilde with the artifact.

quest.Name: Fetch Cythilde Another Artifact
quest.Accomplishment: You found another artifact for a rude tinkerer.
quest.Hagiograph: By the light of a smoky fire, =name= showed mercy on an ungrateful inventor.

step.Name: Return to Cythilde
step.text: Return to Cythilde with the artifact.

quest.Name: Finishing the Conduit
quest.Accomplishment: With your help, Cythilde detected a strange signal.
quest.Hagiograph: Under a sanguine sky, =name= invented the Signal Conduit and detected a strange signal.

step.Name: Find 200 feet of copper wire
step.text: Search the Rustwells, southeast of the Putus Templar Encampment, for 200 total feet of &rCopper Wire&Y

step.Name: Return to Cythilde
step.text: Deliver 200 feet of &rCopper Wire&Y to Cythilde
